metadata.name: Lines Walking: Blue #1
metadata.description:
Lines Walking: Blue #1 (2021)

The 'Lines Walking' series is an exploration of the patterns that emerge from simple rules. All four pieces exhibited from the series (Blue #1, Blue #2, Leaving East Village, and Chelsea) were generated from the same program, but with slight tweaks in how the lines are rendered and placed on the page.

The delightful variation in this program's output inspired the long-form series that shares its name "Lines Walking", and is described in detail here: https://larswander.com/art/lines-walking/

Paper Dimensions: 23 x 31 cm  
JPG Dimensions: 7183 x 9599 px

---

This token is a high-resolution scan of the associated physical plotter artwork. Both the digital token and the physical plot are intended to be held by the same individual. Redemption of the physical plot is optional. The buyer shall be responsible for the cost of shipping and framing. Until the physical plot is redeemed, it will stay in the custody of the artist. It is the responsibility of the previous owner to transfer the physical plot to the new owner in the event of a sale. The physical will not be replotted by the artist.
